title: Required body content when POSTing to /users

displayName.description: Desired display name (which can change over time)

country.description: The country the player asserts they're from

tagline.description: The user's tagline. Can be Markdown encoded and a maximum of 255 UTF-8-encoded bytes.

anonymous.description: Does the user wish to remain anonymous?

consent.description: Does the user consent to terms of service?
